title: Why is hecarim allowed to do 85% of my hp with one combo?
body: His only dmg item is triforce, and when I try to fight him back, I can barely break his cotc shield with my combo. Fix this shit rito.

replies.body: Why is Graves not allowed to get his cigar back?
Because {{champion:120}} is a special needs champion.
you dont understand HEC dont need damage items to do DAMAGE he gets bonus AD from MOVEMENT SPEED
thats what happens when a champion is fed  yo
